#summary Details about supported operating systems.

== Currently supported ==
* Windows XP SP3
* Windows 2003 Server
* Windows Vista SP1
* Windows 7

=== Supported but without releasing binary builds yet ===
* Mac OS 10.4 Tiger
* Mac OS 10.5 Leopard
* Mac OS 10.6 Snow-Leopard
* SUSE Linux
* Ubuntu
* Fedora

== What we are not going to support ==
* Windows older than XP, like Windows 2000/NT or Windows 95/98/ME

== Special cases ==
Here are some possible future ports:
* Windows Mobile (client)
* Iphone controller-mode: impossible to use it as a client but could be used to emulate a keyboard and a mouse so it could run as a server.
